scripts.deploy:agent: git pull && cd client-go && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o pardus-agent . && ./pardus-agent --server wss://pardusc2-demo.bayburt.lu/ws/agent
scripts.deploy:agent:install: git pull && cd client-go && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o pardus-agent . && sudo ./pardus-agent install --server wss://pardusc2-demo.bayburt.lu/ws/agent
